description: '''Brooklyn Bounce''' is one of several pseudonyms used by German [[record producer|producers]] [[Matthias Menck]] (Double M) and Dennis Bohn (Bonebreaker). They have also produced music under the names '''Mental Madness Productions''' and '''Beatbox feat. Rael'''. Menck and Bohn have created [[remix]]es of a wide array of artists, including [[Scooter (music)|Scooter]] and [[Kool & the Gang]].
